title: Pump
description: The Pump element is a reference to a LightSource. It is used within the Laser element to specify the light source for the laser's pump (if any).

subCategoriesOrder.Pump: The Pump element is a reference to a LightSource. It is used within the Laser element to specify the light source for the laser's pump (if any).

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
